author: Catherine Thorbecke, Jeffrey Cook
title: Colorado AG steps in after Hobby Lobby defies COVID-19 stay-at-home order
description: The Colorado attorney general's office stepped in after the craft store chain Hobby Lobby defied COVID-19 executive orders to temporarily close.
content:
The Colorado Attorney General's office sent a letter to Hobby Lobby's CEO, ordering the craft supplies company to shutter stores immediately after it continued operating despite being named a nonessential business during the novel coronavirus pandemic.
